law.catch_line: Responsibility for and control of pool and public affairs budget and staff.

text.section:
Sec. 2-11.27. Responsibility for and control of pool and public affairs budget and staff.
Commencing with the 1996-1997 fiscal year the County Commission pool budget shall be under the direct supervision and control of the County Commission.
The office of the Mayor shall have no responsibility for, nor authority over, the County Commission pool budget and staff, or the budget and staff of the Public Affairs section.
